EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day - Vienna - 2014.09.17.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: You’re invited! Tricentis Partner Day 2014 – Testing for the Future
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-partner-day-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
You’re invited! Tricentis Partner Day 2014 – Testing for the Future
September 17, 2014, Vienna Hotel InterContinental Vienna Johannesgasse 28, 1030 Vienna
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-partner-day-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
Tricentis Accelerate 2014 – Off to Vienna!
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
It’s that time of year again – time to get ready for Tricentis Accelerate 2014. Before the day’s festivities get underway, we’d like to invite you to Tricentis Partner Day. Tricentis Partner Day takes place on the day before Accelerate and is an exclusive, invitation-only event where you’ll have the opportunity to learn the Tricentis perspective on how to accelerate growth and hear the latest on other key topics, such as Mobile + and Service Virtualization.
You’ll also:
- Get a sneak peek into what’s in store for Tricentis Accelerate 2014 - Learn first-hand our company’s strategy and roadmap - Have an opportunity to build relationships and interact with other partners from our partner ecosystem.
12:30 - 1:00pm Registration
1:00 - 1:45pm Welcome & Partner Program: Michael Eckhoff, Senior Vice President Sales, Tricentis
1:45 - 2:45pm Product Roadmap: Wolfgang Platz, Founder & Chief Product Officer, Tricentis
2:45 - 3:15pm Break
3:15 - 4:00pm Tosca Testsuite
4:00 - 4:45pm Tosca Mobile +
4:45 - 5:15pm Break
5:15 - 6:00pm Tosca Service Virtualization
6:00 - 6:15pm Closing
7:00pm Partner Dinner
Register today. We hope to see you there.
Best Regards,
Michael Eckhoff Senior Vice President Sales Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
